amendment.description: Amendment restores $206 million rescinded from VA medical care and construction funding; and offsets this by increasing to $416 million the amount rescinded from the National and Community Service Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restore the entire $206 million rescinded by the bill from VA medical care and construction funding, and offsetting this by increasing by an equal amount (to $416 million) the amount rescinded by the bill from the National Community Service (AmeriCorps) program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 382 - 23, 27 Present (Roll no. 239).
